48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Sa`d bin Abi Waqqas narrated:From Khawlah bint Al Hakim As-Sulamiyyah, that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: “Whoever stops at a stopping place and then says: ‘I seek refuge in Allah’s Perfect Words from the evil of what He has created, (A`ūdhu bi-kalimātillāhit-tāmmāti min sharri mā khalaq)’ nothing shall harm him until he departs from that stopping place of his.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا نَزَلَ مَنْزِلاً
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About What One Should Say When Stopping At A Stopping Place
